Name: Sign of Bombard VI
Desc:
Places the Captain's Mark to direct the Battleship Bomber and Siege Bomber where to bomb. Installed mark will disappear if you press the [Down] arrow key.
In Auto Use Mode, Sign of Bombard is installed every time Parrotargetting hits in a hit location.
Auto Use Mode On/Off: Right-click
Required skill: Sign of Bombard Lv. 15 or higher and Ahoy Mateys Lv. 15 or higher

HFields.h1:
MP Cost: 48. Installed for 64 sec. Up to 1 can be installed at the same time.
Battleship Bomber and Siege Bomber auto-bomb enemies around the marker, prioritizing Parrotargetting targets. If no Parrotargetting target is available, they attack Boss monsters first.
